events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I'd like to request a refund because the size was incorrect.
The customer's request about returning the jacket due to wrong size has been categorized as a refund issue.
An agent specialized in refund cases has been assigned to handle the customer's request regarding the jacket return.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket. I'm here to help you with that process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or if it is still in its original condition?
Thank you for your reply. My order number is 567891234. The jacket is completely new and has tags still attached.
We can process a full refund for your jacket once you send it back to us. We'll provide you a prepaid shipping label for the return.
That sounds perfect, thank you! Please send me the shipping label as soon as possible so I can return the jacket.
We have emailed you the prepaid shipping label. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be issued promptly.
We wanted to check in and confirm you received the shipping label and ask if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and sent the jacket yesterday. Thank you for the quick support!
The refund has been processed and credited to your original payment method. We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
